# Swashbuckler Archetypes
## Overview
The following archetypes are for the [[Swashbuckler|swashbuckler]] hybrid class:


| **Archetype** | **Source** |
|---|---|
| Daring infiltrator | Advanced Class Guide 124 |
| Flying blade | Advanced Class Guide 124 |
| [[Inspired Blade (Archetype)\|Inspired blade]] | Advanced Class Guide 125 |
| Mouser | Advanced Class Guide 125 |
| Musketeer | Advanced Class Guide 126 |
| Mysterious Avenger | Advanced Class Guide 126 |
| Picaroon | Advanced Class Guide 127 |
